content.detailedDescription: i was in bed sleeping and suddenly awoke to what seemed to be very bright pulsating light outside my window. i attempted to look out my window but was unable to seee the source of the light, so i got up and went outside. i stepped outside on my front porch and looked straight up in the sky and saw what i believe to be a ufo. i immediately started recording from my iphone. the object was larger then a normal star and seemed to be rapidly evolving/transforming as it moved across the sky. then in an instant it went from the transforming sphere  into a tiny bright dot which then zipped back and fourt for a moment and vanished.
content.summary: I woke up with my sleep from a shining light through my window decided to go outside and looked up in the sky and saw object

content.detailedDescription: I was in the frontyard with a family member working on a car and we decided to have a break as it was a hot day. the object caught my eye because it was a clear day and the object was reflecting alot of light, whiteish in color. i thought it was an airplane as planes fly over all the time(the house is under the flight path of a few airports and bases) but the object wasnt making any noise which was odd, and there werent any wings or propellers. i noted it to a family member and they responded "its probably a plane" which i explained there werent wings or noise, and at the elevation it was those would be visible, they then said it was probably a helicopter, and i said it couldn't be because we would hear it, so i took out my phone and started recording, it was just white, going in a straight line northwest, with no visible markings, or wings or noises. eventually i got a video of the craft and it disappeared behind the treeline after i stopped recording.
content.summary: Soundless silverish white craft, tube or cigar/blimp shaped, moving in a straight line, no propulsion seen.

content.detailedDescription:
See report no.84445...Submitting photos at this time. 
i
content.summary: Report no.84445

content.detailedDescription:
1. was up late working 

2. i heard a jet sound so i grabbed my binoculars (something i often do with panes) when i looked up though it wasn't a plane. it must've been hovering or something because it was completely stationary, roundish,and glowing red.

3. i believeded it must've been a helicopter but upon when looking at it closer i knew it was something stranger

4. the object was still

5. i was absolutely terrified after realizing it wasn't a helicopter 

6. i lost sight after i heard a loud boom and the next day there were three mutilated birds around my neighborhood
content.summary: A glowing, fireball looking shape, very close to the ground and very large. made the sound of a jet/plane.

content.detailedDescription: moi et un copain ã©tions de retour de notre emploi lorsque nous avons aperã§u sur la rive nord de quã©bec une boule sphã©rique trã¨s brillante qui semblait survoler les ã©difices de la ville de quã©bec. nous avons immobilisã© notre auto sur le cã´tã© et avons observã© la boule qui s'est dissipã© au bout de quelques minutes . la boule est demeurã© stationnaire et nous avons eu le temps de prendre une photo .  ã‡a semblait assez gros et n'avais aucunement l'apparence d'une avion ou d'une hã©licoptã¨re .Il ã©tait 12h45 et la visibilitã© ã©tait quand mãªme bonne.
content.summary: Nous sommes de la rive sud de quã©bec et nous avons vu sur la rive nord  une sphã¨re brillante qui semblait au-dessus des ã©difices de la ville de quã©bec .

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in the backyard with my dog, i was laying down looking up at the night sky. as i was looking to the stars i noticed one was steadily streaking across the sky. it was not an airplane there where no flashing lights, it was just a single white ball of light. it wasn't a shooting star/comet it was moving too slow and it left no trail behind. it lasted a out 2-3  seconds and then it was gone it suddenly accelerated and disappeared behind the tree line.
content.summary: It shot across the night sky, a small ball of light like a star. it was too fast to be a plane and too slow to be a comet.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside at approximately 9:30 p.M. talking on my cell phone gazing at the stars.  upon completing my call i went in the house, set down my phone down and decided to go back outside to view the stars, hoping to see a satellite or shooting star.  i was looking up for about five minutes when i noticed an orange, what i thought was a refection in a tree.  i said to myself, what could be reflecting orange out here and looked back toward the house to see if there was a source.  there were no lights on.  i looked back, took one step to the left to see what it was and observed the most stunning thing i have ever seen.  it was a perfect, orange, translucent sphere the size of a basketball cruising along from the south, houston, heading north at approximately 25 degrees above the horizon.  i was utterly dumbfounded.  i have star gazed my whole life and been to every air show for the last twenty years.  i have never seen anything like it.  it had a translucent appearance with some variance in the surface color.  i immediately tried to discern if it was manmade.  it was so plainly visible i could not see anything to make me think it was manmade.  there was no sound and it just floated along with slight up and down movements.  i moved around the trees and kept in view for approximately forty five seconds.  i yelled for my friend to come out, but by the time he made it out and looked it went behind the trees to the north.  the most amazing thing i have ever seen.  it was surreal.
content.summary: Obsrved a perfect, orange, translucent sphere as big as life, travelling from the south to the north.  observed for approximately 45 seconds

content.detailedDescription: I took this picture almost a couple years ago and i saw a triangle clouds i took a picture and noticed the red glowing thing off to the left and when i looked back up after looking at the picture i took and it was all just about gone but the top of the triangle. i am waiting for nasa tot get back to me but feeling they will not and hoping i can get some answers.. i know it is not a lens flare i have taken many many picture after this of the sun in all forms of lighting and clouds and not once have any repeat of this sighting
content.summary: Triangle cloud formation and the glowing object (not a lens flare)

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out my house window looking south in the sky noticed object at a lower altude no noise approaching my house heading north bright landing light on the bottom i then went to the front to see the ufo coming over the craft looked like a swept wing shuttle the bottom color was white could not see what color the top because of the bright landing light no engine noise red light was above the white light the ufo was heading in a down ward path i noticed a jet was small like a fighter jet heading from west to east another jet was heading in the opposite direction both jets were well above the ufo,then as i was looking at the ufo descending another one came from the same direction looking like the lead ufo came in faster and in a steeper incline as to catch up,no#2 ufo also had no noise  and also descending untill both of them i lost sight. as for my reactions,and feelings i thought it may be a smaller space craft that the air force was testing.
content.summary: One ufo heading from south to east,another one heading from noth to east, gliding no noise,landing light on white looking bottom shuttle like description 0ne third size of the bigger one used for space flight.

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were on our way to tesco, after which we were planning to go on to an evening picnic. when we made it to the carpark (facing tesco and the white rabbit pub), my friend pointed to the sky, and we both observed a disk like object pass from left to right. it was small, disk shaped object, that in fact looked a little like a flying saucer sweet! 

at first i thought it must have been a balloon-craft (it could perhaps have been a zepplin?) but it was too far away. it was very fast, and maintained a strangely path. it was a dully blue on top, and a dull yellow underneath. the evening light seemed to shine off the bottom. i could not make out any windows, only a domed shape on the top and the bottom. it disappeared behind a building to our left and did not come out the other side. i can only assume it changed direction. 

my friend and i looked at each other, shocked! we could not believe what we had seen and started guessing at plausible explanations. we did not know who to go to until we found this site!

we are planning to go back when university starts again to try and catch it again, and take a photo if we see anything.

we were heading to a picnic to celebrate the full moon. we thought that maybe the full moon may have some connection to what we saw. 

we would love some feedback to put this idea to rest in our heads if this is possible!
content.summary: A small disk passed from left to right while i was standing in tesco carpark. it disappeared behind a building and did not come out the other side.

content.detailedDescription: Whilst out playing tennis i was talking to a friend and we both looked up to mention what a nice day it was to play tennis. then i saw 2 flying spheres quite distinct in the sky flying over us. at the start they were on top of each other in the sky and as they passed us the lower craft went behind the first as to follow the first. i remember how sperical they were and how shiny they looked. clear sky so could watch them as far as the eye could see. no other aircraft in the schnand was def not a plane as we were standing too close to see. no wind as it was a perfect sunny day and they were moving quite fast in the sky.
content.summary: Watched two flying over

content.detailedDescription: I was driving through front royal, va and noticed an object in the sky that was long, black and cigar shaped. i thought it was a paraglider at first, but no one was suspended from it. then i thought it might be a balloon, but it wasn't moving. when i saw the object it was hanging horizontally in the sky and then slowly moved to a vertical position. that was the only movement it made. it was literally hovering in the air. when i arrived at my destination i took three photos and then went to get my kids out of the car so they could see. it took me about 30 seconds to get them out and by then the object was gone. there were no clouds that day, it was hot, and a light breeze. this object did not make any sense as it did not move- no swaying, no dropping, no bending, nothing.
content.summary: I saw a black oblong shaped object in the sky that makes no sense to me.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a very nice evening and i was waiting to start a 6km run in the olympic statium in munich, germany along with thousands of other runners.  they were staggered start times so you lined up and were let start in groups.  while waiting in the crowd to start i notices a small flash in the sky.  the sky was blue with very little cloud cover so the object was hard to see unless it flashed.  i observed more flashes counting about 7 in total.  they were hovering or staying pretty much in the same place though after a few minutes they did seem to be drifting.  one of the objects when it flashed showed two of them right beside each other.  i thought they were just close to each other but that was not the case.  over the next ten minutes they did not move any further apart.  when i moved forward with the crowd getting closer to the start i got a bit closer to the flashes and noticed that the double object seem to have a very faint line connecting them both.
as i was running i had no camera and got seperated from my friends so no one else seemed to notice them.  i observed them for 10-12 minutes, could have been a little longer.  they moved in the sky but not very much.  finally it was our groups turn to go to the start line, at this time i went under part of the building and could not see them anymore.  as i ran i kept an eye out again but didn't see them again.
i am guessing it would have been interesting to see 40k+ runners and spectators gathered around a big event.  while i was observing them they were observing us.
content.summary: 5-8 objects hanging in the sky flashing occasionally

content.detailedDescription: Returning back from work i realized there was an unfamiliar luminous object hovering at middle altitude over the area of san josé, near to the santa ana county, which suddenly moved north towards the area of san rafael de alajuela, hovering again for 3 to 5 seconds. after that it began ascending, by the time i had started my cellphone camera. all details afterwards are in the video. it moved at constant speed, invariable from beginning to end of path, non forced stops and seemed to rotate from time to time, exposing what i believe might be two sides of a presumably circular, compact structure which faced red lights on one side and green ones on the other. the object disappeared behind the roofs of the neighborhood in direction to santo domingo de heredia or possibly towards san pedro de montes de oca. it was clear that this was not an airplane, helicopter or drone, i am used to see them all since childhood and i can tell the difference. it was not a meteor nor a balloon nor any kind of human device known so far. i wish it might have come closer or landed close to my position but it was not the case. i don't care if it was et, all i'd like is to know if there's anything here they are looking for. i can be quite direct i did not forge this with any kind of digital graphics software, i am a call center agent with no intentions to lose my job for any fakes.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Double-colored hovering object over san josé, costa rica

content.detailedDescription:
I was staying at a homeless shelter during a hard time in my life, and was spending alot of alone time outside at night looking up and because my father worked for the d.O.D.And on his death bed told me things that where on his mind for years and now could finally tell me some of the stuff anyway
  we are regularly visited by et.Races in the range of 10-17races of et.S coming in the last 100 yr
s many more have been here in the distant past
 i have been abducted since i was 13 and still am on some occasion.S i felt there presence out above the bridge where a light was blinking and moving quite strangely and un regular flight patern clued me that it was something not normal.I took ten pics of the light and surrounding area in sky capturing a unbelievably amazing pic of a young t-shirt shaped almost square like craft with a light that gave it away lolol! best picture of ufo i have and this isn't the only ones i have either, i want to see the reaction to this first.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Outside on a bridge near homeless shelter i was staying at when a light (2)i saw one left fast one stayed for about 7min apx.  which i photoed with my cell phone, changed contra. and sharpness and the craft appears.

content.detailedDescription: Doing maintenance on my vehicle and was taking a break and just happened to look up and noticed an object that looked odd that was flying very high that should have had wings or contrails at that altitude immediately thought to myself that i have just seen a ufo i was pretty excited to say the least
content.summary: Looked up seen silver object no wings or trails high altitude

content.detailedDescription:
25 july 2017 about 11pm.

sky clear – lots of stars (i was out taking the dog for its late-evening walk). i was walking towards the junction of stonebridge boulevard and river road east in wasaga beach, ontario, ie, towards the river and the lake beyond which were both out of sight.

looking north-west, appeared to be three close, equally-spaced unblinking orange lights. seen slightly to the left (west) of the end of the ‘handle’ of the ‘big dipper’ and between it and the ground, travelling slowly, steadily, approximately north-north west. after a few moments in sight of the observer the lights disappeared abruptly for no obvious reason (did not pass behind obvious obstruction). a watch was kept for some minutes but the lights did not reappear.

conclusions:
almost certainly not a firework.
could it have been a drone – conceivably, but seems very unlikely and i think not.
could it have been a normal aircraft – no, the lights were not arranged in a pattern, or of a colour, or unblinking (continuously visible), as typical with normal man-made aircraft, so i would say not.
size and speed could not be determined due to lack of suitable reference features.
not possible to say whether in level flight or climbing, but thought to definitely not be in descending flight.
other than my being unable to ascertain the precise nature of the phenomenon, or to account for the unusual colour, or lack of typical aircraft ‘blinking’, and sudden disappearance, the object/lights exhibited no other definitely attention-getting characteristic. 
uncertain whether the phenomenon appeared suddenly or whether i just happened to catch sight of it at that moment.
no physical features of the object were visible.
content.summary: See below

content.detailedDescription: Doing maintenance on my vehicle and was taking a break and just happened to look up and noticed an object that looked odd that was flying very high that should have had wings or contrails at that altitude immediately thought to myself that i have just seen a ufo i was pretty excited to say the least
content.summary: Looked up seen silver object no wings or trails high altitude

content.detailedDescription:
I noticed it in the south south-eastern sky and it was heading east northeast, towards the center of death valley national park. i was very near panamint springs, where the 190 and panamint valley rd. intersect approximately. i was a mile or so from panamint springs resort doing some stargazing. i had just turned looking to the south in the direction of saturn/sagittarius when a moving light caught my attention.

it was a solid light, nothing was blinking on it, but it did appear to pulsate a bit. it made no sound. and it was stopping and starting, and moving not in a direct line but in a squiggly/"s" type of movement. it was traveling from the sse to the ene however. it definitely seemed to be in our atmosphere, but it was pretty high up. i'd imagine it was far too high up to be a drone, and it traveled quite far to be a drone. drones are also banned in the park and it was dark, so i think that rules it out as a hobby drone. perhaps the military has something else. 

and it wasn't coming in for a landing, but staying at its altitude and slowly faded away as it moved to the northeast. given there are several military installations and testing grounds nearby, it has to be something from one of them. but you never know. i tried to rationalize it as a military craft or perhaps a hobby drone, but the drone i think is not correct. 

as to whether it was a plane or a helicopter. definitely not. it's wiggly movement rules out a plane, and it made no noise. if it were a helicopter, why no noise? also the wiggly movement is too much for even a helicopter, unless it was completely out of control. 

it's not a satellite or shooting star. 

could it have been a balloon? maybe. but why was it lit up? and it's wiggly movement was still a bit too much for that.

sorry for the movement in my videos, but i only had my cell camera and it was surprisingly difficult to hold the camera still. the movement is exaggerated in the video but it is true to what it was.
content.summary: Light traveling in a wiggly line from sse to ene direction in death valley

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the clouds move rapidly like i've never seen. i started seeing theses little orbs in the sky everywhere over the ocean and just dropping . almost like they lost power they would drop like a crash. then i witnessed at first i thought three objects in the air moving to west slowly . they were too far to record from my view so i got as close as i could . i managed to capture them in broad daylight moving in formation very slowly almost at a hover. i couldn't believe my eyes i believed in it but i always wanted proof and now i have it . the clouds were thick, shorty after i lost sight of them due to visibility.
content.summary: Most bizarre thing i've ever witnessed

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my dog outside and was looking up at the stars and such like i normally do. i happened to see what i thought was a really bright star, i didn't think anything of it. i noticed it started moving ne and it was snaking and zigzagging, and then it just hovered for a few more moments and then it continued ne a lot faster than it was moving previously. i lost sight of it when it flew far enough out past the trees. i was a little startled because i knew it couldn't have been a plane or a helicopter because they don't move like that and helicopters, and planes have flashing lights, while this was just a solid light like a star, but a lot brighter.
content.summary: It was a bright light and it hovered, flew and zigzagged then it took off fast.

content.detailedDescription: Having a smoke outside, noticed bright green orb, no trail at all, heading at high rate of speed @ what id estimate between 20-30k feet.
content.summary: Bright green orb, high rate of speed. linear path to west from palm beach county heading west.

content.detailedDescription: Bright orb brighter than the stars around it perfectly clear night. this object was filmed by my iphone going sw to ne steadily with no sound 2nd one in three days brighter than any other i have seen.
content.summary: Been watching every night that's clear since my first sighting 4 year starts ago since the. been trying to prove what i've  seen. bright orb brighter than the other stars around it moving steadily across the night sky.

content.detailedDescription: Bright orb brighter than the stars around it perfectly clear night. this object was filmed by my iphone going sw to ne steadily with no sound 2nd one in three days brighter than any other i have seen.
content.summary: Been watching every night that's clear since my first sighting 4 year starts ago since the. been trying to prove what i've  seen. bright orb brighter than the other stars around it moving steadily across the night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
It was dusk and i had been outside for about an hour or so observing passing air traffic using my high-powered binoculars.  as it was dusk, i started to look for stars/planets, first finding jupiter (to my west-southwest).  in fact, jupiter was the only space object i had seen so far today.  continuing to scan the skies, i turned about 360 degrees to see what i could see.  i spotted with my naked eye what appeared to me to be a brighter-than-jupiter object, and so i took a look through my binoculars.  focusing on the object as best i could, i reckoned it to be a planet, and was going inside to check my astronomy software to try and determine what it was i was observing.  but before i could do that, i saw that the object "separated," for lack of a better word.  the best way i can describe it was that it was a balloon of some type and a portion of it -- like a gondola -- dropped away from the balloon.

this object i witnessed falling was leaving a trail of, presumably, smoke and whatnot.  also, the falling object was lit up, so much so that it appeared to me to be of the same brightness that i had observed when i first spotted the object.

at some point while the object was falling, my attention was drawn away to what appeared to be two aircraft flying almost within the field of view; that is, i could almost see both the airplanes and the falling object through my binoculars (they are a non-zoom type).

the airplanes looked to me like b-52 stratofortresses...Perfectly lined up so that it looked like one plane with two sets of wings.  these airplanes were headed east-northeast.

returning my visual focus to the object i originally observed, well...I didn't see it.  i looked through my binoculars and with my naked eyes: nothing.  and now the airplanes were out of view.

regarding the airplanes, my best guess on their altitude would be less than 10,000 feet.  i say this because i think i recall hearing the airplanes (which is why my attention was diverted to them).  and given the airplane-gazing i had been doing just before, i know what an airplane at, say, 30,000-40,000 feet looks like...And they are nowhere near that large.

as far as the other object is concerned, i estimate its altitude to be in the same range.  i say that partly because of how "quickly the one object was falling.  my considered opinion is that the object would not have appeared to me to be moving so quickly had it been a a much-higher altitude.

following my failed effort to visually reacquire the falling object and the "parent" object, i looked to see if i could spot the airplanes.  i could not.  they had become blocked by a building.

thank you.
content.summary: Looked like star, then it separated, part of it dropping as if it was a balloon.

content.detailedDescription:
I was working on the dana point headlands preserve within the city of dana point, ca.  my boss was also there but did not witness the event and was speaking to someone else.  i looked up and noticed a black spot of what i first thought was a turkey vulture circling in the sky to the south/east over the camp pendleton marine corps base.  i noted the black spot which i thought was a turkey vulture circle to the north and then it traveled into a cloud.  i thought that was odd behavior for a turkey vulture to fly into a cloud.  i waited for the bird to exit the cloud but it never did.   then the cloud started to shrink.  slowly at first but as it got smaller it shrank faster and faster until the cloud was completely gone.  it did not move up,down or sideways, it just disappeared. i never saw the black spot again.  it was too late to point out my observation to my boss, as there was now nothing to see.   it perturbed me.  i started to think why would an object go into a cloud and then the cloud dissipated.  
the first think i thought of was fresh water harvesting, possibly through an inter dimensional portal.  but over an active military base?   very strange.

i tried to submit this info years ago but was unable to due to technical difficulties.  tm
content.summary: Black object came around a cloud and dissapeared into the cloud, but did not re-emerge.  the cloud eventually. disappeared like it was absorbed or taken by the object.

content.detailedDescription: I was, once again, taking photos of the lightning during a storm on july 22nd,2017. i was using my cell phone and an app on my phone designed to take 100 pictures in a few seconds. when i was reviewing the photos i found one photo with an object in it that seems to be illuminating either the clouds or rain around it. it only appeared in one photo. i have submitted two photos takes just a few split seconds apart showing that the object was in one and no others.
content.summary: While taking lightning photos noticed light

content.detailedDescription:
I was  4 years old ( in 1966) when i began speaking about my imaginary friend, tony smithenhouser.  tony was very, very tall with long arms and was a conductor or engineer  on the railroad. he wore a special suit for work and a hat.  our property had a rr easement through it.  everyone in my family knew about my friend and would refer to him speaking to me whenever a train horn went off nearby.  i have always lived by train tracks!
tony would come to visit me during the night because trains were not very busy then.  he would walk through our field and knock on my bedroom door 3 rapid knocks and a scrape.  my door opened to the outside. tony would tell me stories of far away places and promised me someday he would show me the snow...We rarely have snow in my area.
i lost touch with tony smithenhouser somewhere around 12.  don't know why.
his visits always led me outside to look up at the night sky.  i could feel comfort there.
fast forward to 1986 and i was still living in my parents home, but taking care of my mother, who had terminal breast cancer.  it was in february and my bedroom flooded as the wind pushed the rainwater over the foundation and into my bedroom.  i recall vividly when i propped open my door to the outside to air out the musky smell.  i was using a towel to soak up the rainwater across the room when i stopped and froze.  it felt like all the air was sucked out of my bedroom.  no sounds at all.  i felt a presence enter my room from outside.  i heard communication within my thoughts, though not male or female.  the sound was musical.  i turned and saw 2 beings unlike anything i'd ever imagine.  they were hovering above the floor of my room, near the open door.  their skin was pearlescent, and glowed white.  their heads were hairless and their skull only slightly larger in width than ours would be.  their communication  with me in musical tones that i somehow understood. there were only 2 beings, one taller, both wearing flowing gown of white...Very white.  the taller being looked at me directly and asked me to trust it.  the smaller being outstretched it's 4 fingered hand, long fingers, no thumbs.  my hand reached outward but did not touch the hand of the being.  inches apart, my body  elevated and we were hovering at the doorway.  was i comfortable?  yes.  we moved effortlessly,  slowly down the long side porch, me hearing their communication all the while.  we stopped.  i was hovering above the ground.  i was asked to look forward as far as i could see.
far from our house, in the middle of our 87 acre hay field was a ship.  it hovered above the ground.  more beings stood in hover formation as we glided toward the craft.  it was pleasant and familiar, as though i were once again with tony smithenhouser.
i remember nothing after this except waking up in my bed, in my clothing and muddy shoes under the covers at 3:33am hearing that musical notes blaring in my ears.  i felt panic and breathless.  what happened?   i knew it happened, was real.  but what and why?   i fell asleep and missed work the next day. i don't honestly recall anything after that.

the music sounded much like kitar, but slower and echoed.

i was a willing participant.  i was left with a pea sized lump under my left ear.  countless doctors, no one notices.

i have a calling now to photograph the sun, moons, skies, clouds, planets.

last night i captured orbs, spheres and worm like craft.  beautiful!

no trepidation felt.  i enjoy the time behind the lenses.

i have a genetic mutation disease called s.A.P.H.O. syndrome.  came on suddenly in 2006.  82 specialists from stanford to ucla have no explanation or treatment...Other than for pain.  i have photos, documents, labs, gallium scan fail, etc. of the testing i had done from 2006 through 2014.  now i use energy and vibrational therapy to help.

interesting, no?
content.summary: diff shape, diff colors.  several odd shapes and mostly blue-green orbs and spheres

content.detailedDescription: I was sleeping and was awakened to a grey alien who forced my face to touch their face, mostly my forehead.  i could feel them pulling my thoughts away, while i kept asking what they were doing.  they kept interrupting me, not by answering, but with pulling my thoughts while i was questioning them and telling them not to do that.  it lasted about 15 minutes.  i thought it was very rude, as they weren't listening to me.  afterwards i have noticed that i easily discern what people are thinking, and even voice it moments before they do.  i'm definitely picking up a different frequency after this encounter.
content.summary: A grey appeared to me and held my face to its face and kept pulling my thoughts while doing this'll.

content.detailedDescription: I was sleeping and was awakened to a rustling noise in my ensuite.  at which time i sat up and looked, only to find three reptilian entities holding instruments they were looking at.  as i watched them i was afraid of why they were there and wondered to myself of how they got in my house.  instantly i knew they arrived inter-dimensionally and i wasn't as afraid.  i then wondered to myself, "are there really such things as aliens?  are they really here?"  then one main reptilian started walking towards my bed and the other two seemed fascinated with their surroundings and stayed back, looking more at my ensuite.  at that time, in answer to my question, appearing in my vision were letters typing out in neon green that spelled out "they're definitely there".  i layed back in my bed, and i could see up close the one reptilian who came to the side of my bed.  i saw his legs and the detail of his scales on his legs.  i stayed there until they left.
content.summary: Reptilian like entities appeared inter-dimensionally and communicated telepathically and with a visual text in my vision.
